General.Name: KEDE Numerical Control Co Ltd
General.Description: KEDE Numerical Control Co., Ltd. manufactures and markets CNC systems and functional components in China. It offers five-axis vertical machining, mill-turn composite machining, gantry machining, tool grinding, horizontal machining, blade milling machining, and horizontal flap machining centers; other domestic high-end CNC machine tools; numerical control systems; servo drive systems; servo motors, torque motors, linear motors, and spindle motors; angle sensing systems, linear laser interferometer and feedback ruler, laser tool setting instrument, and wireless workpiece probe; and various drive swing angle milling heads, rotary table, electric spindles, etc. The company was formerly known as Kede CNC Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Dalian, China.
